sentence.Network_en: It had once been the home of a wealthy nobleman.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里曾是一个有钱贵族的宅邸。

sentence.Network_en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

sentence.Network_en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

auth_sentence.content: I returned home to go to a local school.
auth_sentence.res_content: I returned home to go to a local school.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I returned home to go to a local school.

auth_sentence.content: Liam comes home from hospital, quiet and withdrawn.
auth_sentence.res_content: Liam comes home from hospital, quiet and withdrawn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Liam comes home from hospital, quiet and withdrawn.

auth_sentence.content: Will Home Before Dark do the trick this time?
auth_sentence.res_content: Will Home Before Dark do the trick this time?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Will Home Before Dark do the trick this time?

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自百度翻译。
